root: ^I'm still trying to wrap my head around it.
^You fought against Levalon Philel, and didn't die?
^Barely. You can thank Aether for that.
^I mean, like, what did it feel like to be relentlessly attacked by Philel?
^I guess I'm just glad that it wasn't me.
^Yes, I regret that it had to be me.
^Yeah, no kidding. I hope it didn't hurt too bad.
^It was the most pain I have ever experienced.
^Right. Naturally you can understand why I didn't want to fight.
^Yes, I can see the appeal of not being in such a situation.
^So am I. Might I ask: if you didn't want to fight, how did you end up in the army for House Spider-Lily?
^Well, capable warriors were in high demand. Unfortunately, I just so happened to be one of them. So I didn't really have a choice.
^So you are a talented fighter, yet you didn't want to fight?

^Of course it does. One shouldn't be forced to only do that which they are most capable of doing. Ambition and talent are two very different things, but to those few whose ambitions and talents do align, there is great potential.

^I agree. Everyone kept telling me that I had to fight. I was good at it, so that was the only thing I should think about doing. As if my talent was a naturally calling that defined my ambitions. I want to do what I want to do. Not what others think best for me to do.
^I understand that far more than you could imagine.
^So tell me, did I make the right choice to avoid the fight, even though my house will certainly not forgive me?

ABSOLUTELY: ^You absolutely made the right decision. The only one who should decide your destiny is you.
^In truth, I wish to be a traveling performer.
^Then be the best performer the world has ever seen!
ABSOLUTELYNOT: ^While I agree that you should be able to pursue your own ambitions, sometimes it is best to follow through on the duties bestowed to you.
^Sometimes we must do the things we hate in order to succeed. Just do not forget your true desires. One day they may come to fruition.
^Well, it's not like I have any more responsibilities in House Spider-Lily. Besides get arrested, that is.
^I would prefer it if you didn't.
